Nitro Gradient Forge

Build shadcn components that glow with cinematic gradients.

A polished studio for custom shadcn theming. Light and dark modes, export-ready tokens, and surface-aware overlays designed for production design systems.

Theme Engine

Persisted theme + color mode with data attributes ready for shadcn component tokens.

Surface-aware Layers

Cards, sidebars, and overlays inherit subtle tints for depth without losing contrast.

Memory Lane Unlock

Preview all public palettes to unlock the secret theme for your portfolio or product demo.

Copy-ready Exports

Grab the exact CSS + Tailwind aliases used here and drop them into any app.

Workflow

A clean, repeatable flow for shipping gradients across shadcn components.

1

1. Pick a palette

Preview all Nitro gradients and lock in the vibe for your app.

2

2. Map tokens

Use the CSS variables and Tailwind aliases to wire in colors.

3

3. Apply surfaces

Drop in the surface tint layer for cards, sheets, and sidebars.

4

4. Ship the theme

Export snippets and ship a consistent theme across components.

Use Cases

Where this theming system fits best.

SaaS dashboards with polished gradient theming
Portfolio demos for UI engineering roles
Design system spikes for shadcn component suites
Startup landing pages with cinematic brand color

What is next as we scale the theming system.

Preset editor

Component playground

Theme Gallery

CLI Export

Ready

Export themes in 8+ formats directly from the command line.

initScaffolds theme files and context
exportGenerates CSS, JSON, Tailwind, W3C tokens
--injectAdds theme CSS automatically
npx gradient-forge export --theme theme-nitro-midnight-blurple --format all

Export Formats

Multiple formats to fit any workflow or design tool.

CSS Theme
SCSS
JSON Tokens
Tailwind
W3C Tokens
Figma

Theme Export

Export midnight blurple theme in multiple formats

Multi-Format

Complete CSS theme file with all variables

Theme Colors

primary
secondary
accent
background
card
muted
border
destructive
theme-nitro-midnight-blurple-theme.css
/* Gradient Forge Theme: Midnight Blurple */
/* Color Mode: dark */

.theme-nitro-midnight-blurple {
  --background: 235 26% 11%;
  --foreground: 235 30% 95%;
  --card: 235 22% 12%;
  --card-foreground: 235 30% 95%;
  --popover: 235 22% 12%;
  --popover-foreground: 235 30% 95%;
  --primary: 241 92% 70%;
  --primary-foreground: 235 26% 98%;
  --secondary: 210 92% 65%;
  --secondary-foreground: 235 26% 98%;
  --muted: 235 20% 20%;
  --muted-foreground: 235 20% 72%;
  --accent: 210 92% 65%;
  --accent-foreground: 235 26% 98%;
  --destructive: 0 84% 60%;
  --destructive-foreground: 0 0% 98%;
  --border: 235 18% 25%;
  --input: 235 18% 25%;
  --ring: 241 92% 70%;
  --chart-1: 241 92% 70%;
  --chart-2: 210 92% 65%;
  --chart-3: 251 92% 62%;
  --chart-4: 220 80% 55%;
  --chart-5: 260 70% 45%;
  --sidebar-background: 235 26% 9%;
  --sidebar-foreground: 235 30% 95%;
  --sidebar-primary: 241 92% 70%;
  --sidebar-primary-foreground: 235 26% 98%;
  --sidebar-accent: 235 20% 20%;
  --sidebar-accent-foreground: 235 30% 95%;
  --sidebar-border: 235 18% 25%;
  --sidebar-ring: 241 92% 70%;
  --app-gradient: radial-gradient(1050px 560px at -10% -20%, hsl(241, 92%, 70% / 0.3), transparent 60%),
    radial-gradient(920px 520px at 112% 2%, hsl(210, 92%, 65% / 0.22), transparent 58%),
    linear-gradient(160deg, hsl(235 26% 11%) 0%, hsl(235 26% 11%) 50%, hsl(235 26% 11%) 100%);
  --app-surface-tint: hsl(241 92% 70% / 0.1);
}

/* Surface Layer Styles */
.bg-card,
.bg-popover,
.bg-sidebar {
  background-color: hsl(var(--background) / 0.34);
  background-image: linear-gradient(var(--app-surface-tint), var(--app-surface-tint));
  backdrop-filter: blur(16px);
}
